plot: Pig butchering scams lure victims into fake investments, draining life savings. John Oliver examines origins, techniques used, vulnerabilities exploited, and provides prevention tips to avoid falling prey to devastating financial fraud.

John Oliver discusses a popular internet scam called pig butchering, why it is easy to fall for these kind of scams, who is behind it and most importantly how to protect ourselves and our loved one's from being an unfortunate victim of it. These elaborate and authentic looking scams dries up people's lives' savings.—Niaz Islam Arif
